DESCRIPTION: Create or update a role message to be sent when a user gets or loses a role.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}rolemessagecreate add [#Channel] [@Role | Role ID] [Message or JSON Code]** ~ Create a role message to be sent whenever a user gets a new role.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}rolemessagecreate remove [#Channel] [@Role | Role ID] [Message or JSON Code]** ~ Create a role message to be sent whenever a user loses a role.
USAGE: {{prefix}}rolemessagecreate [add | remove] [#Channel] [@Role | Role ID] [Message or JSON Code]
INVALID_CHANNEL: You did not provide a valid channel ID. Without a channel ID I will not be able to send the message anywhere.
INVALID_ROLE: You did not provide a valid role ID. Without a role ID, I will not be able to tell when the role is given or removed.
CREATED: The role message has been created.
UPDATED: The role message has been updated with the new message.
